meanings.sent1: I need to retape the box before shipping it.
meanings.sent2: She likes to retape her favorite movie to keep it safe.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally retaped my fingers together while wrapping a gift.
meanings.sent4: The memories of our trip are retaped in my mind like a cherished video.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the tape being retaped echoed in the room.

meanings.sent1: After the painting peeled off, I had to retape it to the wall.
meanings.sent2: He decided to retape the broken pages of his notebook.
meanings.sent3: I retaped the torn map, but now it looks like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like it needed to be retaped after the breakup.
meanings.sent5: The gift wrap was so beautiful that I had to retape it just to admire it more.

meanings.sent1: I will retape the torn book cover to keep it from getting worse.
meanings.sent2: The ripped poster was retaped carefully to preserve it.
meanings.sent3: He retaped the leaky pipe, but it still dripped like a sad faucet.
meanings.sent4: Her broken spirit needed to be retaped with love and kindness.
meanings.sent5: The retaped package arrived safely, thanks to the extra care put into it.
